title: 11: No Such Thing As A Door Knob In Vancouver
content: This week in the QI Office Dan Schreiber (@schreiberland), James Harkin (@jamesharkin), Andrew Hunter Murray (@andrewhunterm) & Anna Ptaszynski (@nosuchthing) discuss wombat defence, Thailand's underwear policy, how to insult a Prime Minister and more...
